definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
Bristol port city in southwest England

pinyin: Bu4 li3 si1 tuo1 er3 Hai3 xia2

sentences.english: The pro rowers from Bristol usually row in a mixed four team.
sentences.chinese: 來自親賽艇運動員布里斯托爾通常排在混合四隊。

sentences.english: Bristol is in the west of England.
sentences.chinese: 布里斯托爾位於英蘭西。

sentences.english: They went up the Severn from Bristol to Gloucester.
sentences.chinese: 他們向塞文河上游駛去，從布里斯托爾港到格洛斯特。

sentences.english: The University of Bristol scientists uncovered the claw near Prum, Germany. It's approximately 400 million years old.
sentences.chinese: 布里斯托爾大學的科學家們在德國珀拉附近發現了它。

sentences.english: Some might get no farther than Bristol.
sentences.chinese: 對有些人來說，征程可能不會遠於布里斯托。

sentences.english: We used to live in Bristol but now we live in London.
sentences.chinese: 本人們疇前住在布里斯托爾，但如今住在倫敦。

sentences.english: We set out from Bristol on the 4th of May, 1699.
sentences.chinese: 我們於一六九九年五月四日從布里斯托出發。

sentences.english: The Bristol University investigators say a precautionary approach is needed.
sentences.chinese: 布里斯托爾大學研究人員們認爲預防措施是必要的。

sentences.english: Passengers for Newport and Cardiff change at Bristol Parkway.
sentences.chinese: 前往新港和加的夫的旅客請在布里斯托大道換車。

sentences.english: Well, I moved to Bristol when I got here first.
sentences.chinese: 我剛來這兒的時候，搬去了布里斯托。

sentences.english: The train passes through Reading on its way to Bristol.
sentences.chinese: 火車在去布里斯托的路上要經過裏丁。

sentences.english: We'll start early and make for Bristol by lunch time.
sentences.chinese: 我們將早早出發，午飯前朝布里斯托爾前進。

sentences.english: Little tyke fell asleep just as we were flying over Bristol.
sentences.chinese: 小傢伙一飛到布里斯托就睡着了。

sentences.english: Little tyke fell asleep as we were flying over Bristol.
sentences.chinese: 當我們飛過布里斯托爾時那小孩睡着了。

sentences.english: This plant is now found only on Lundy in the Bristol Channel.
sentences.chinese: 現在這種植物僅只在布里斯托海峽的廊荻才能找到。
第七章去布里斯托爾途中。

definition: Bristol port city in southwest England
Manchester/also written 曼徹斯特|曼彻斯特
Coventry city in West Midlands 西米德蘭茲|西米德兰兹[Xi1 mi3 de2 lan2 zi1], UK
